title: What did you wear to your high school graduation? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have this family tradition, we don’t waste our time with ceremonies. I didn’t go to my graduation because I had moved to another state and been in college for a year by the time I graduated from high school. My son went to his and wore white shirt, black dress pants, black shoes and socks—that was the required uniform for everyone. Girls could wear black skirts but high heels were frowned upon and considered unsafe. it took about as long to find a parking spot and then to locate him afterwards as it did for the 800 students to walk across the stage. My daughter decided just to skip the ceremony after that hassle—neither went to their college graduation ceremonies.

Because of certain circumstances I wore a pair of side tie bikini bottoms cap and gown. Nothing more . Nothing less. The knots was visible under the gown atleast I thought they were . I ended up taking them off right before I walked the stage . Invigorating to say the least.. 😉😜😁
